title: Our Sectors
subtitle: Comprehensive Business Solutions
description: Explore our diverse range of specialized sectors

elevator.title: Elevator Sector
elevator.description: Established in 2006 AD in order to keep pace with the urban renaissance that took place in the Kingdom
elevator.preview: Work in this sector began in 2006, with contracts signed with several government, private,and civil entities. We have extensive experience in the supply, installation, and maintenance of elevators, lifts, and escalators. We have a distinguished list of clients from both government and private sectors. In addition to our exclusive agencies, we cooperate with several leading elevator manufacturers. We also carry out maintenance and rehabilitation work for old elevators. To better serve our clients, we have added a specialized division for the supply of various spare parts.

contracting.title: Contracting Sector
contracting.description: Successfully implementing several projects, including residential, administrative and commercial buildings and other civil works in the public and private sectors
contracting.preview: One of the most important sectors within Al-Othaim United Company, the company has obtained a First-Class classification and has executed a number of diverse projects with various governmental and private sectors.

investments.title: Investments Sector
investments.description: In the field of private investments, we invest with partners in purchasing shares in existing companies, help companies finance their operations and expansions
investments.preview: One of our most important investment activities is real estate development, whether in developing land or existing properties. We have a proven track record of outstanding projects at the Kingdom level, and the company is one of the companies qualified as a real estate developer by the Ministry of Municipalities and Housing.

next-consulting.title: Consulting Sector
next-consulting.description: In the field of private investments, we invest with partners in purchasing shares in existing companies, help companies finance their operations and expansions
next-consulting.preview: A distinguished team of programmers and business developers to provide technical software to government agencies and the private sector, specializing in Microsoft applications and other professional applications and programs.

hotel.title: Ajyad Hotel Services
hotel.description: Al-Othaim Hospitality is distinguished by its comprehensive experience in providing its services and investment capabilities
hotel.preview: Premium hospitality services with exceptional guest experiences.
